subject: Urgent: Your account has been limited
body: Dear User, we noticed unusual activity properly verify your account immediately at http://paypal-secure-verify.com otherwise we will lock it.
label: phishing

subject: Your Amazon.com order #123-4567890-1234567
body: Hi John, your package has shipped! Track it here: https://amazon.com/track-package
label: legitimate

subject: Wire Transfer Needed ASAP
body: I am in a meeting. Please wire $50,000 to this vendor immediately. I will explain later.
label: phishing
